title: UUID id is not supported for MySQL

labels.name: triage/out-of-date
labels.description: This issue/PR is no longer valid or relevant

body:
### Describe the bug

I've got an error on row.getUUID("id"):
java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException: Can not retrieve row value[11c7160e-d629-11ec-a153-0242ac160002] as class[java.util.UUID], columnName=[id]
Please bump vertx-sql-client version at least to 4.2.3 version instead of 4.2.2 to support UUID (https://github.com/eclipse-vertx/vertx-sql-client/pull/1109).

### Expected behavior

UUID successfully retrieved from row

### Actual behavior

java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException: Can not retrieve row value[11c7160e-d629-11ec-a153-0242ac160002] as class[java.util.UUID], columnName=[id]

### How to Reproduce?

row.getUUID("id")

### Output of `uname -a` or `ver`

_No response_

### Output of `java -version`

_No response_

### GraalVM version (if different from Java)

_No response_
